Package simulation.montecarlo

package simulation.montecarlo
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Constants
    Constants to be used throughout the program.
    CrystalField
    Builds and holds the crystal field Hamiltonian and given some (Bx,By,Bz) combination, adds a Zeeman term and diagonalizes to get eigenenergies and magnetic moments of the two lowest-energy levels.
    deltaEnergyAndLattice
    Object returned by the Monte Carlo step that holds the new lattice (spin configuration), the energy change, and the method used for the self-consistent solution
    FieldTable
    Holds a table of precalculated values and performs interpolation to get requested values.
    FieldTableTest
     
    GetParamValues
    Get parameters and constants from the parameter file "parameters_{system_name}.properties".
    Lattice
     
    LatticeTest
     
    Main
     
    MonteCarloSimulation
    Abstract class for a Monte Carlo simulation (either with multiple temperatures or with a single temperature)
    MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation
    Monte Carlo simulation with multiple temperatures (holds multiple objects of SingleTMonteCarloSimulation)
    ObservableExtractor
    Extracts measurement from a Lattice object
    ObservableExtractorTest
     
    OutputWriter
    Manages the output of a simulation
    OutputWriter.Builder
    A builder class for creating instances of OutputWriter
    ParseCommandLine
     
    ReadInteractionsTable
    Reads the interaction between pairs of spins from a file
    ReadInteractionsTableFe8
    Reads the interaction between pairs of spins from a file for the Fe8 system.
    ReadInteractionsTableLiHoF4
     
    ReadInteractionsTableLiHoF4Test
     
    ReadInteractionsTableTest
     
    returnDoubleAndStatus
    Class used to return a value from a FieldTable object in addition to a boolean used to indicate whether a manual calculation (exact diagonalization) was performed.
    SimulationCheckpointer
    Saves and loads a checkpoint that can be used to restart the simulation if stopped or crashed
    SimulationCheckpointerTest
     
    singleSpin
    A single spin object
    SingleTMonteCarloSimulation
     
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    OutputType
    Type of output the simulation gives.
  • Annotation Interfaces Summary
    Annotation Interface
    Description
    CreatesInconsistency
    Signifies that a method changes the lattice such that the magnetic moments are incompatible with the magnetic fields they induce.
